slides.name: Maple Old Fashion
slides.description: Our Maple Old Fashioned Cocktail Recipe is simple and delicious, a nod to a classic with a Vermont twist. WhistlePig PiggyBack is crafted with a mash bill of 100% Rye giving it 100% full flavor to stand up in our signature cocktail -the Maple Old Fashioned.
slides.Ingredients: 1 ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ¼ oz WhistlePig Barrel Aged Maple Syrup, 3 Dashes Maple Bitters, Fresh Orange Peel for Garnish

slides.name: Maple Bourbon Sour
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100 Proof Bourbon, ¾ oz WhistlePig Barrel Aged Maple Syrup, 1 oz freshly squeezed Lemon Juice, 2 Dashes Bitters, 1 Egg White, Fresh Orange Peel or Cherry for garnish

slides.name: RyeBall
slides.Ingredients: 1 ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ¼ oz WhistlePig Barrel Aged Maple Syrup, 3 Dashes Maple Bitters, Club Soda, Fresh Lemon Peel for Garnish

slides.name: Vermont Mule
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100% Rye (or PiggyBack 100 Proof Bourbon), 4 oz Ginger Beer, ½ Lime, squeezed, Lime Wedge for garnish

slides.name: Here's To You Old Pal
slides.Ingredients: 1 ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ¾ oz Dry Vermouth, ¾ oz Campari, Lemon Peel for garnish

slides.name: Smoked Lemonade
slides.Ingredients: 1 ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 oz Simple Syrup, 1 Candied Lemon for garnish

slides.name: Maple New York Sour
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ½ oz WhistlePig Barrel Aged Maple Syrup, 1 oz Lemon Juice, ½ oz Fruity Red Wine

slides.name: Paper Pig
slides.Ingredients: ¾ oz PiggyBack 100 Proof Bourbon, ¾ oz Aperol, ¾ oz Amaro Nonino, ¾ oz Lemon Juice, DIY Paper Pig for garnish

slides.name: Piggy On Fire
slides.Ingredients: 1 ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ¾ oz Barrel-Aged Maple Syrup, ¾ oz Lemon Juice, 2 dashes Habanero Bitters, 5 dashes Cocktail Foam, 1 pinch of Fresh Cracked Pepper for garnish, 1 Dried Lemon for garnish

slides.name: Ryerita
slides.Ingredients: 1 ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ½ oz Ancho Reyes, ¼ oz Lime Juice, ¼ oz Lemon Juice, ¼ oz Orange Juice, ¼ oz Simple Syrup, 3 dashes Fee Bros Orange Bitters, Lime Cup filled with 151 Rum

slides.name: Pig Viper
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, ¾ oz Lime Juice, ¾ oz Grapefruit Juice, ½ oz WhistlePig Barrel Aged Maple Syrup, ½ oz Falernum, 2 Dashes Angostura, Grapefruit Twist and Mint Sprig for garnish

slides.name: Eggless Whiskey Sour
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100 Proof Bourbon, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, ¾ oz WhistlePig Barrel Aged Maple Syrup, ½ oz Liquid Aquafaba, 6 grains of Salt (or 1-2 drops of 6:1 Saline), Ice, Luxardo Cherries and Lemon Peel for garnish

slides.name: Dirty Shirley
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, 1 oz Grenadine, 8 oz Lemon-Lime Soda, Maraschino Cherries for garnish

slides.name: This Lil' Piggy
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz WhistlePig PiggyBack Rye, ¾ oz Chinato, ¼ oz Sakura, 3 dashes Black Walnut Bitters, Cocktail Cherry for garnish

slides.name: Starlino Manhattan
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, 1 oz Starlino Rosso Vermouth, 2 dashes Angostura Bitters, Starlino Maraschino Cherries for garnish

slides.name: Mr. Black Cold Fashioned
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz Mr Black Coffee Liqueur, ½ oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, 2 Dashes Orange Bitters, Fresh Orange Peel for Garnish

slides.name: Carpano Classico Manhattan
slides.Ingredients: 2 oz PiggyBack 100% Rye, 1 oz Carpano Classico Vermouth, 2 dashes Angostura Bitters, Cocktail Cherries for garnish
